title: Where can I take my yard waste in New Hanover County.  I have it loaded in a trailer but do not know where to take it.
text:
Yard waste is not accepted at the New Hanover County landfill. The
county landfill lists these facilities that accept yard waste for a
fee:                     

American Property Specialists  910-793-1460     

Blue Horizon  910-343-9696                                     

SeaSide Mulch  910-791-2100                                     

Wilmington Materials 910-763-4569           



Here's a link with more information.

http://www.myreporter.com/?p=3696
